items.title: Here’s the official 40-page 2025 LEGO Holiday gift guide: Winter Village, advent calendars, Disney, Star Wars, and more
items.summary:
Well folks, we’re getting closer and closer to November, which means the LEGO shopping season is about to heat up, and now we have LEGO’s official and complete 2025 holiday gift guide. There are 40 pages of ideas that would make great gifts for the builders in your life, spanning popular themes like the Winter Village sets, advent calendars, Botanical decorations, Disney sets, Star Wars kits, and so much more. The LEGO Group has already geared up its holiday gift guide page here, with things continuing through the next two months, all the way up to Christmas. Below, you’ll find a rundown on LEGO’s 2025 holiday sale, including dates, as well as all 40 pages of the gift guide scan.

items.title: Russian drones hunt down, chase out Ukrainian civilians, UN inquiry finds
items.summary: GENEVA (Reuters) -Russia has been chasing civilians who live near the front line in Ukraine with drones, hounding them out of their homes and hunting them down, forcing thousands to flee whole areas in what amounts to a crime against humanity, a U.N. inquiry found. Read full story

Annie Palmer / CNBC:
Filing: iRobot says its last potential buyer withdrew from the process and its financials remain dire, following Amazon abandoning a 2024 bid; IRBT drops 33%+  —  Shares of iRobot plunged more than 30% on Monday after the company warned its search for a buyer has hit a substantial roadblock and its financial condition remains dire.

items.title: COI Energy solves a conundrum: Letting businesses sell unused electricity — catch it at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
items.summary: Large enterprises routinely buy  more electricity than they use.  COI Energy has a patented platform that lets them sell and share.

items.title: Skyline Nav AI’s software can guide you anywhere, without GPS — find it at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
items.summary: The company's so-called Pathfinder software can look at almost anything — buildings, tree-lined roads, even aerial views — and quickly match it to a database and generate real-time navigation.

items.title: Oxford spinout RADiCAIT uses AI to make diagnostic imaging more affordable and accessible — catch it at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
items.summary: “What we really do is we took the most constrained, complex, and costly medical imaging solution in radiology, and we supplanted it with what is the most accessible, simple and affordable, which is CT,” Sean Walsh, RADiCAIT’s CEO told TechCrunch.

items.title: Miraqules will showcase its blood clotting technology at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
items.summary: India-based Miraqules developed a nanotechnology that mimics blood clotting proteins to quickly stop heavy bleeding.

items.title: Biotech Nephrogen combines AI and gene therapy to reverse kidney disease — check it out at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
items.summary: Although Maxim was convinced that gene therapy could reverse PKD, the biggest hurdle was creating a mechanism to deliver the drugs directly to the diseased cells.

Today’s deal comes in at the same Prime Day rate we spotted three weeks ago, with $150 cut from the going rate for the second-best price we have tracked. items.title: The current AI investment boom will spark a "wildfire" that wipes out some companies, yet bolsters and enables others by unlocking GPUs, energy, and talent (Dion Lim/CEO Dinner Insights)
items.summary:
Dion Lim / CEO Dinner Insights:
The current AI investment boom will spark a “wildfire” that wipes out some companies, yet bolsters and enables others by unlocking GPUs, energy, and talent  —  AI won't crash—it will burn.  Like every tech cycle, the fire will clear the brush, redistribute talent, and leave infrastructure to power what comes next.

These offers are expected to be part of Walmart’s first of three Black Friday and Cyber Monday events, featuring discounts of up to 75% on everything from LEGO sets and Apple gear to TVs and more. items.summary:

Aside from returns like the new DELTA 3 Pro home backup bundle low, you’ll find other returning offers like the DELTA Pro Ultra Smart Extra Battery at $1,899 shipped, which beats out Amazon’s pricing by $200. While it carries a $3,299 MSRP directly from the brand, the price is normally kept down between $2,299 and $2,099, though we have seen two previous falls to $1,899, as well as a dip further to the one-time $1,884 low during Prime Day three weeks ago. items.summary:
The 2025 Black Friday deal season is upon us and early details from the major retailers are starting to flood in. This year we are already getting official confirmation from many of the biggest retailers and brands on when you can expect the Black Friday and Thanksgiving deals to begin and it looks like we are going to be getting a full month worth of big-time discounts in 2025. Deals are actually kicking off on October 31 this year and carrying right through to Thanksgiving 2025 and Black Friday with various sale events throughout the month of November.

items.title: Threads adds ‘ghost posts’ that disappear after 24 hours
items.summary: Instagram Threads is launching “ghost posts,” a new disappearing-posts feature that lets users share updates that automatically archive after 24 hours. The ephemeral option — rolling out globally on Monday — aims to encourage more casual, low-pressure sharing.

items.title: Sora is showing us how broken deepfake detection is
items.summary: OpenAI's new deepfake machine, Sora, has proven that artificial intelligence is alarmingly good at faking reality. The AI-generated video platform, powered by OpenAI's new Sora 2 model, has churned out detailed (and often offensive or harmful) videos of famous people like Martin Luther King Jr., Michael Jackson, and Bryan Cranston, as well as copyrighted characters […]

The AI buildout, surpassing railroads and the internet, moves Big Tech from being asset-light to asset-heavy, which has historically produced inferior returns  —  Executive Summary  —  The AI revolution has reached a key inflection point, with the largest U.S. tech firms embarking on a massive AI infrastructure buildout.
